org.xbmc.android.util

Class HostFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.android.util.HostFactory

  • public abstract class HostFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that keeps a) a reference to the currently used host b) all the code between the provider and the settings stuff
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • readHost

        public static void readHost(Context context)
        Reads the preferences and returns the currently set host. If there is no preference set, return the first host. If there is no host set, return null.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to current activity

      • getHost

        private static Host getHost(Context context,
           int id)
        Returns a host based on its database ID.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to activity
        id - Host database ID
        Returns:

      • getHost

        private static Host getHost(Context context)
        Returns the first host found. This is useful if hosts are defined but the settings have been erased and need to be reset to a host. If nothing found, return null.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to activity
        Returns:
        First host found or null if hosts table empty.
